Desert Safari

attachments.displayName:
Desert Safari

Desert safari is a MUST if you are in Dubai for a holiday. Visit to Dubai is a waste without the incredibly adventurous voyage into the endless heart of the desert. As soon as you reach, you will be greeted with the divine Arabic coffee accompanied by some assorted snacks. Experience the exciting roller-coaster ride on the luxury 4 wheeler across the tranquil red sand dunes of Arabia with a stop to capture the breathtaking view of the picturesque sunset, thus giving you an opportunity to enjoy the serenity of the timeless desert. Enjoy riding on a camel, wearing Arabic costumes, watching belly dance show, and much more. Let your hands and legs decorated with beautiful henna designs or just relax and enjoy the traditional food.

It will be  a power packed vacation with memorable experiences. Your fantasies of all about Arabian nights will come true after your visit.You will have lots of adventure and  fun. Along with the traditional Arabic experience, you will also witness the beauty of modern architecture during your Dubai desert safari tour.

Desert Safari 

Desert safari is a MUST if you are in Dubai for a holiday. Visit to Dubai is a waste without the incredibly adventurous voyage into the endless heart of the desert. As soon as you reach, you will be greeted with the divine Arabic coffee accompanied by some assorted snacks. Experience the exciting roller-coaster ride on the luxury 4 wheeler across the tranquil red sand dunes of Arabia with a stop to capture the breathtaking view of the picturesque sunset, thus giving you an opportunity to enjoy the serenity of the timeless desert. Enjoy riding on a camel, wearing Arabic costumes, watching belly dance show, and much more. Let your hands and legs decorated with beautiful henna designs or just relax and enjoy the traditional food. 

It will be  a power packed vacation with memorable experiences. Your fantasies of all about Arabian nights will come true after your visit.You will have lots of adventure and  fun. Along with the traditional Arabic experience, you will also witness the beauty of modern architecture during your Dubai desert safari tour.
